html:
11.14.17  3:30 pm   How can I train myself to have interesting thoughts and ideas on the fly, like you?

     just start having any ideas you can on the fly. then soon you will find out that at any given time you are a mere stone's throw away from something very interesting, if not already

11.14.17  2:28 pm   how many unanswered questions are there

     more than answered

11.14.17  2:09 pm   What should I do to celebrate the 131st anniversary of the hole-punch

     the same thing you did last year!

11.14.17  2:06 pm   Where is the true magic?

     look around you

11.14.17  1:44 pm   how come you haven't done a new anagram since july 10th

     i've done hundreds since then, and i continue to release them steadily one a 1-per-day basis. but i respect your opinion

11.14.17  1:34 pm   11.13.17  2:21 am    How do you make your musics good?

     just try to make it however you can, and then check afterwards to see if it's good

What if I can't tell if it's good or not?

     you can make it however you want. just make it how you want to make it. or if you are feeling a little frisky, make it how you don't want to make it

11.14.17  12:53 pm   Are you on a roll?

     yes

11.14.17  12:08 pm   how do i solve problems

     first figure out the problem

11.14.17  10:56 am   DAMN IT BILL ! YOU'RE MAKING ME LIKE REGGAE !!!

     oh no. don't listen to heart of the congos (1977) by the congos

11.14.17  10:26 am   Im gonna to impres u with my good grammer!

     the best way to impress me with grammar is to talk in a way that i can understand your ideas

11.14.17  9:11 am   whats the secret to life

     discovering the secrets

11.14.17  9:05 am   What if chairs don't exist?

     ah now you've got me thinking

11.14.17  9:04 am   How can I have babies with a person

     follow the instructions on the back

11.14.17  8:44 am   who decides what beliefs and viewpoints are incorrect?

     oxford university

11.14.17  7:49 am   is the world ok?

     yes

11.14.17  6:58 am   have you ever seen Disney's little mermaid?

     no

11.14.17  6:19 am   last night I saw a dream where I am sitting on top of a pyramid. why did it happen?

      because it seems like the most important part of the pyramid

11.14.17  6:18 am   what makes me a good person?

     you

11.14.17  6:17 am   do you tube?

     i don't know what that is but no

11.14.17  5:36 am   Could you show me a way to think faster and express my thinking clearer?

     you could try drinking water and sit up straight and stretch and walk around, maybe jump a bit

11.14.17  5:12 am   Where is the organism?

     look in the mirror

11.14.17  3:53 am   do you ever want to sing something loud, wild, and mean but can't because of the thin walls dividing you and your neighbors?

     yes

     or is that just not your thing?

11.14.17  3:24 am   do you think I should learn how to stop biting my nails so I can grow them out on my right hand for mini guitar picks connected in my fingers.

     sure

11.14.17  3:20 am   if a politician came to you and said "I want to use 27 seconds of your song 'In California' for my political ad" and the politician seemed like a reasonable dude, would you accept?

     i think you are $kipping an important detail

11.14.17  3:18 am   my mind just told me this in a dream: "The Triceratops won the war three times before if was over."

     that makes sense

11.14.17  3:11 am   should I try to be depressed for a day and see what it's like?

     sure

11.14.17  2:27 am   how would you describe a color to a blind person 

     i would prefer to do something a little more constructive

11.14.17  1:51 am   Am I stupid for liking your songs? 

     do you think my songs are stupid

11.14.17  1:50 am   what's the most sarcastic response you've given to a question?

     i don't have a way to determine

11.14.17  1:39 am   did you say you lived on kosciuszko street just to make the rhyme with eat?

     i never said i lived on kosciuszko street, i said i lived at kosciuszko street

11.14.17  12:19 am   I like someone but I'm afraid of the social implications of liking someone. Should I just go back to bed?

     try to like more people, for practice

11.14.17  12:14 am   what is this sorcery

     unsubcribing from a mailing list

11.14.17  12:02 am   In regards to the whole "do you mean what you say in your lyrics" thing: I think I figured out that I'll say a bunch of stuff that I don't mean or really understand but I know exactly how it feels, saying it. And really that's what's important to the song at the end of the day. Cuz arguably the song IS the feeling, or a bunch, or none. Idk :p is this something you think about too? 

     yes. even more fun bonus is when you can get something to feel vividly like it means something but you can't explain why

11.13.17  11:33 pm   what convinced you to add a favicon

     so far nothing. although many people have tried

11.13.17  11:29 pm   do you sometimes like to lie?

     i use fiction, i don't know if that counts. for example, once up on a time i am santa (claus)

11.13.17  11:21 pm   what's a common experience for many people that you've never experienced?

     eating a lobster (for the folks at home, that's like a huge red bug, with claws)

11.13.17  11:20 pm   when was a time you acted nonchalant but were going crazy inside? 

     right now

11.13.17  11:20 pm   why do I look so much cooler with sunglasses?

     because no one can see your thoughts. so it is natural for people to assume you are thinking about how much money you have

11.13.17  11:08 pm   Thoughts on silverware?

     back in my day, if you wanted a spoon and a fork, you had to go to the spoon store and get a spoon, and go to the fork store and get a fork (separately)

11.13.17  11:08 pm   have you ever heard mexican music?

     yes

11.13.17  10:28 pm   What's your question answering strategy?

     maybe something like this

11.13.17  9:14 pm   can you make a 'mmm' sound without putting your lips together?

     yes

11.13.17  9:09 pm   How many questions have you answered?

     you wanna check

11.13.17  9:04 pm   what's a good hook for an essay?

     and you do the harlem shake

11.13.17  9:03 pm   do you think the smoke detector is a good instrument?

     yes

11.13.17  8:53 pm   I just watched "Tuesday" for the first time, and it's Monday, and I'm supposed to be writing a poem. Did you plan it this way?

     no

11.13.17  8:42 pm   what's your favorite shark?

     the 3D one in back to the future 2

11.13.17  8:29 pm   I wish Czechoslovakia was still a country :/  

     great news, now it's 2 countries!

11.13.17  8:22 pm   How to kill boredom?

     invest in foreign currencies

11.13.17  8:18 pm   where does that highway go to?

     an even higher way
